import React, {useContext} from 'react' import LogoImage from '../Pages/assets/images/logo/logo.png' import { AuthContext } from '../Context/auth' import LogoutIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Logout'; import MenuIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Menu'; import ManageSearchIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ManageSearch'; const PageHeader = () => { const { logoutUser } = useContext(AuthContext); const handleLogout = () => { logoutUser(); } return (
) } export default PageHeader
